message.content:
cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.DS

The paper deals with security issues in XML-based protocols and proposes a method for anomaly detection using language representation and grammatical inference. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also involves machine learning techniques for language inference, which suggests the category cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the implementation of the proposed method in web services, indicating the category cs.SE (Software Engineering). The paper also involves the use of automata, which suggests the category cs.PL (Programming Languages). Finally, the paper involves the use of stream validation, which suggests the category cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
